meanings.definition: Not involving or relying on experiments.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used a nonexperimental approach to explain the concept.
meanings.sent2: The nonexperimental study focused on observations rather than tests.
meanings.sent3: The nonexperimental method of teaching made learning more engaging.
meanings.sent4: Her nonexperimental mindset allowed her to think outside the box.
meanings.sent5: The nonexperimental nature of the project led to innovative solutions.

meanings.definition: Not based on or derived from experimentation.
meanings.sent1: The artist's nonexperimental style was unique and captivating.
meanings.sent2: The nonexperimental design of the building stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent3: His nonexperimental cooking technique resulted in a surprisingly delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The writer's nonexperimental approach to storytelling was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The nonexperimental music genre challenged traditional norms.
